title: What are people's thoughts on Pascal case?
content: I think Pascal case is OK. But personally, I prefer camel case. I wish I could use it everywhere, likeThis!

title: Come on, folks. AI learning models are not a threat.
content: Go about your business. Pay no mind to the AI behind the curtain. We have nothing to fear, right fellow humans?

title: I'm looking for a partner for a project...
content: This project is going to be so good. I don't really know how to code though... I'm more of an idea man. Anyone interested? Pays 8.25 per hour.
